content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position not specified, but indicated as a new position)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position not specified)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to entity placement
- Ensure that the new position for placing entities (like the boiler) is not obstructed by existing entities. Check surrounding entities before placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power connection
- Ensure that all power-consuming entities (like the steam engine and assembling machine) are connected to a power network to avoid warnings and operational issues.
